name: MALWARE DETECTED
description:
Setup

You play as an Anti-Virus seeking to destroy all malicious malware inside of an infected computer!

Gameplay

Fast-Paced and brutally hard, this game will challenge your precision, reaction time, and reflexes. Killing malware with piercing bullets can alter you or your surroundings. 

Assets

All assets(with the exception of music) were made within the 48h constraints. 

Music and Licencing - https://evankingmusic.com

I hope you have fun playing it. I had some issues submitting, but we got there in the end!
